20101224140125.000|20101224140128.000|CC1|>> WELL, RICHARD, I THINK WE    
20101224140128.000|20101224140128.000|CC1|SHOULDN'T OVERREACT TO THIS AND

20101224140131.000|20101224140132.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT PICKS UP INFORMATION 
20101224140132.000|20101224140134.000|CC1|ABOUT TERRORISTS LOOKING AT     
20101224140134.000|20101224140136.000|CC1|INNOVATIVE AND CREATIVE WAYS TO 
20101224140136.000|20101224140136.000|CC1|EVADE SECURITY.                 
20101224140136.000|20101224140138.000|CC1|SO WHAT THEY DO IS THEY PUBLISH 
20101224140138.000|20101224140140.000|CC1|THIS INFORMATION, PUSH IT OUT TO
20101224140140.000|20101224140142.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES AND SAY LOOK AT THIS
20101224140142.000|20101224140143.000|CC1|AS A POSSIBILITY.

20101224140145.000|20101224140146.000|CC1|THREAT IT'S TIED TO.            
20101224140146.000|20101224140148.000|CC1|WE ALSO LOOK AT ALL THE THREATS 
20101224140148.000|20101224140150.000|CC1|AND PLOTS WE'VE BEEN DEALING    
20101224140150.000|20101224140150.000|CC1|WITH.                           
20101224140150.000|20101224140153.000|CC1|THEY HAVE ALL BEEN COMING FROM  
20101224140153.000|20101224140154.000|CC1|OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES.      
20101224140154.000|20101224140156.000|CC1|BE IT THE AIR CARGO FAILED      
20101224140156.000|20101224140157.000|CC1|ATTEMPT IN OCTOBER.             
20101224140157.000|20101224140159.000|CC1|SO TSA WILL PAY ATTENTION TO    
20101224140159.000|20101224140201.000|CC1|THIS BUT THIS IS NOT CAUSE FOR  
20101224140201.000|20101224140202.000|CC1|CONCERN AS FAR AS I BELIEVE.    
20101224140202.000|20101224140204.000|CC1|>> ROGER, WHEN WE FIRST GOT THAT
20101224140204.000|20101224140205.000|CC1|BULLETIN FROM THE TSA WE WERE   
20101224140205.000|20101224140208.000|CC1|GOING THROUGH AND TRYING TO

20101224140209.000|20101224140210.000|CC1|CONTAINERS WE WERE TALKING ABOUT

20101224140211.000|20101224140212.000|CC1|EXAMPLES THAT MIGHT INVOLVE WHAT
20101224140212.000|20101224140213.000|CC1|THEY'RE SAYING.                 
20101224140213.000|20101224140215.000|CC1|THIS IS A THERMOS BRAND BEVERAGE
20101224140215.000|20101224140216.000|CC1|CONTAINER WITH AN INSULATED     
20101224140216.000|20101224140217.000|CC1|WALL.                           
20101224140217.000|20101224140218.000|CC1|THIS IS PROBABLY MORE COMMONLY  
20101224140218.000|20101224140220.000|CC1|THE ONE THAT WE SEE WHEN WE TALK

20101224140235.000|20101224140236.000|CC1|DRINK, DRINK AND PUT THIS BACK

20101224140239.000|20101224140240.000|CC1|CONCERNED ABOUT IS -- ACTUALLY  
20101224140240.000|20101224140242.000|CC1|I'M CRACK THIS OPEN, WHICH IS   
20101224140242.000|20101224140243.000|CC1|THE WALL IN BETWEEN.            
20101224140243.000|20101224140244.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20101224140244.000|20101224140246.000|CC1|>> NOW, THIS SPACE WHEN I       
20101224140246.000|20101224140251.000|CC1|CALCULATED, IT HOLTZ ABOUT --   
20101224140251.000|20101224140253.000|CC1|HOLDS ABOUT ONE CUP OF A LIQUID,
20101224140253.000|20101224140254.000|CC1|ABOUT EIGHT OUNCES.             
20101224140254.000|20101224140256.000|CC1|WHAT MIGHT BE ABLE TO BE SLIPPED
20101224140256.000|20101224140258.000|CC1|INSIDE A THERMOS LIKE THIS      
20101224140258.000|20101224140259.000|CC1|INSIDE THIS WALL SPACE?         
20101224140259.000|20101224140301.000|CC1|>> WATCH OUT FOR THE EXPLOSIVE  
20101224140301.000|20101224140302.000|CC1|EGGNOG, NUMBER ONE.             
20101224140302.000|20101224140304.000|CC1|I THINK THERE IS ALWAYS A       
20101224140304.000|20101224140305.000|CC1|CONCERN THAT IF YOU HAVE ANY    
20101224140305.000|20101224140308.000|CC1|TYPE OF CONTAINER WHERE A       
20101224140308.000|20101224140311.000|CC1|CHEMICAL EXPLOSIVE, PETN, SOME  
20101224140311.000|20101224140311.000|CC1|OF THE THINGS THAT HAVE BEEN    
20101224140311.000|20101224140314.000|CC1|USED IN THE PAST, MAYBE EVEN A  
20101224140314.000|20101224140315.000|CC1|PEROXIDE-BASED EXPLOSIVE,       
20101224140315.000|20101224140316.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH VERY UNSTABLE, THAT IS 
20101224140316.000|20101224140318.000|CC1|WHAT TSA WOULD BE LOOKING FOR.  
20101224140318.000|20101224140319.000|CC1|THERE'S ALSO THE POSSIBILITY    
20101224140319.000|20101224140321.000|CC1|THAT TERRORISTS IN THE PAST HAVE
20101224140321.000|20101224140323.000|CC1|USED ONE CONTAINER TO PUT ONE   
20101224140323.000|20101224140325.000|CC1|CHEMICAL COMPOUND IN AND THEN   
20101224140325.000|20101224140326.000|CC1|BROUGHT ANOTHER CONTAINER,      
20101224140326.000|20101224140328.000|CC1|ANOTHER COMPOUND IN A SEPARATE  
20101224140328.000|20101224140330.000|CC1|ITEM AND COMBINED THEM ONCE THEY
20101224140330.000|20101224140331.000|CC1|GOT ON THE PLANE.               
20101224140331.000|20101224140333.000|CC1|THAT WAS WHAT LED TO THE BANNING
20101224140333.000|20101224140336.000|CC1|OF LIQUIDS FOR A WHILE BACK IN  
20101224140336.000|20101224140338.000|CC1|2006 AS A RESULT OF THE HEATHROW
20101224140338.000|20101224140338.000|CC1|PLOT.                           
20101224140338.000|20101224140339.000|CC1|SO AGAIN, I THINK THIS IS THE   
20101224140339.000|20101224140341.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT BEING PRUDENT, BUT I 
20101224140341.000|20101224140342.000|CC1|DON'T THINK IT'S AN             
20101224140342.000|20101224140342.000|CC1|OVERREACTION.                   
20101224140342.000|20101224140344.000|CC1|THIS IS CREATIVE, ADAPTIVE WAYS 
20101224140344.000|20101224140347.000|CC1|THAT TERRORISTS MAY TRY TO EVADE
20101224140347.000|20101224140347.000|CC1|SECURITY.                       
20101224140347.000|20101224140350.000|CC1|>> SO WOULD SUCH AN EXPLOSION   
20101224140350.000|20101224140351.000|CC1|USING, AGAIN, EIGHT OUNCES OF   
20101224140351.000|20101224140352.000|CC1|LIQUID THAT MIGHT BE ABLE TO FIT
20101224140352.000|20101224140354.000|CC1|IN HERE, WOULD THAT BE ENOUGH TO
20101224140354.000|20101224140355.000|CC1|TAKE DOWN A PLANE?              
20101224140355.000|20101224140356.000|CC1|>> WELL, IT DEPENDS.            
20101224140356.000|20101224140358.000|CC1|IT DEPENDS ON WHAT TYPE OF      
20101224140358.000|20101224140400.000|CC1|CHEMICAL CALM BOUND, WHAT TYPE  
20101224140400.000|20101224140401.000|CC1|OF EXPLOSIVE.                   
20101224140401.000|20101224140403.000|CC1|IT DEPENDS WHERE THE DEVICE IS, 
20101224140403.000|20101224140405.000|CC1|IF IT'S NEXT TO THE SKIN OF THE 
20101224140405.000|20101224140405.000|CC1|AIRCRAFT.                       
20101224140405.000|20101224140408.000|CC1|IT COULD CERTAINLY CAUSE A      
20101224140408.000|20101224140409.000|CC1|RUPTURE AND LEAD TO A STRUCTURAL
20101224140409.000|20101224140410.000|CC1|FAILURE.                        
20101224140410.000|20101224140411.000|CC1|>> I KNOW WE HAVE TO GO BUT ONE 
20101224140411.000|20101224140412.000|CC1|LAST QUESTION.                  
20101224140412.000|20101224140413.000|CC1|IT HAS BEEN SAID THAT THEY'LL BE

20101224144646.000|20101224144648.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20101224144648.000|20101224144648.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20101224144648.000|20101224144652.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20101224144652.000|20101224144652.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20101224144652.000|20101224144654.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20101224144654.000|20101224144656.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20101224144656.000|20101224144658.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20101224144658.000|20101224144658.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20101224144658.000|20101224144659.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20101224144659.000|20101224144659.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20101224144659.000|20101224144702.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20101224144702.000|20101224144702.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20101224144702.000|20101224144704.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20101224144704.000|20101224144706.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20101224144706.000|20101224144706.000|CC1|            by helping          
20101224144706.000|20101224144707.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20101224144707.000|20101224144707.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20101224144707.000|20101224144710.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20101224144710.000|20101224144710.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20101224144710.000|20101224144713.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20101224144713.000|20101224144713.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20101224144713.000|20101224144716.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20101224144716.000|20101224144716.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20101224144716.000|20101224144717.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20101224144717.000|20101224144717.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20101224144717.000|20101224144719.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20101224144719.000|20101224144721.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20101224144721.000|20101224144721.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20101224144721.000|20101224144723.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20101224144723.000|20101224144723.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20101224144723.000|20101224144724.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20101224144724.000|20101224144726.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20101224144726.000|20101224144726.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20101224144726.000|20101224144728.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20101224144728.000|20101224144728.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20101224144728.000|20101224144730.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20101224144730.000|20101224144730.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20101224144730.000|20101224144732.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101224144732.000|20101224144734.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20101224144734.000|20101224144734.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20101224144734.000|20101224144736.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20101224144736.000|20101224144736.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20101224144736.000|20101224144739.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20101224144739.000|20101224144739.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20101224144739.000|20101224144741.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20101224144741.000|20101224144741.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20101224144741.000|20101224144742.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20101224144742.000|20101224144742.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20101224144742.000|20101224144745.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20101224144745.000|20101224144745.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101224144745.000|20101224144748.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20101224144748.000|20101224144749.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20101224144749.000|20101224144751.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20101224144751.000|20101224144751.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20101224144751.000|20101224144753.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20101224144753.000|20101224144753.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20101224144753.000|20101224144756.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20101224144756.000|20101224144756.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20101224144756.000|20101224144807.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.    
20101224144807.000|20101224144959.000|SEG_01|Type=Story start
